predicate.note: Frames file for 'accentuate' based on sentences in ECTB. No VN entry.

example.name: passive, arg1 only
example.text: With these new changes , the tasks of Customs with regard to [*] legally levying taxes , [*] striking at smuggling , export refunds , etc. will be further accentuated [*-17] .
example.arg: [*-17] -> the tasks of Customs with regard to [*] legally levying taxes , [*] striking at smuggling , export refunds , etc.
